2021.title: Towards a Tool that Facilitates Designing Robotic Hands
collaborators: Researchers from the University of Copenhagen
Researchers from San Francisco State University
2021.description: A project focused on accumulating data about existing robot hands in the academic and commercial domains to develop tools that assist researchers and experts in designing new iterations of these devices.

2021.title: An Investigation of Haptic Feedback Design Parameters
collaborators: Researchers from the University of Copenhagen
Researchers from the Gwangju Institute of Science and Technology
2021.description: A research project centred around discovering the most prevalent parameters in guiding user perception of vibrotactile stimuli. The investigation aims to assist haptic designers and researchers in further understanding the best practices of creating haptic icons. We hope to contribute to the field by implementing a tool that predicts the dissimilarity between two vibrotactile stimuli.
